page.title: 02Who are we ?
page.content:
The population is fairly mixed with respect to age throughout the area and it is generally{middle class}but each village has its distict differences. Rolleston has a more indigenous population than the others and a higher proportion of people is employed in farming. Morton has a mixture of people, from long established village families and {newcomers}who originate from various parts of the country. As a rule, but not exclusively, the incomers live in the newest properties. Fiskerton has the highest percentage of non-indigenous inhabitants who are by far the most mobile. It is also a slightly younger community and many of the incomers have an urban background. There are no ethnic differences.
{
